snippet: The Russians overcame a two-set deficit to win its fourth gold medal in men’s volleyball, the most of any nation.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; Russia wins their first men's volleyball gold in 32 years by rallying for a five-set victory over Brazil; other Olympic events noted.
lead_paragraph: The Russians overcame a two-set deficit to win its fourth gold medal in men’s volleyball, the most of any nation.

headline.seo: Russia Men Win Olympic Volleyball Title; U.S. Adds Wrestling Gold
headline.main: Russia Saves Match Points, Rallying to Volleyball Gold
headline.print_headline: Russia Saves Match Points, Rallying to Volleyball Gold
